subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{sense|first; beforehand}} In Standard Mandarin, {{lang|zh|先}} comes before the verb; in Cantonese and Southeast Asian Mandarin, {{lang|zh|先}} comes after the verb.
